item.title: Crit Happens
item.description:
This humble dice roller is crafted for simplicity. Choose from the trusty dice of your trade, roll one or many, add modifiers as needed, roll multiple times, or even summon a die with an unconventional number of sides. Straightforward and reliable, just as any adventurer would need.

Seek to tailor your journey to your own design? Aquire the Tinker’s Token to unlock a realm of customization and control in the Tinker’s Workshop, where your dice-rolling experience is yours to perfect.

“Really cool, I’m using it on my phone. I like it a lot.”

— Mike “Sly Flourish” Shea

Reply via email

item.title: Luminary
item.description:
Say hello to Luminary, your personal sun tracker! Whether you’re chasing the perfect sunset, planning your next outdoor adventure, or just want to know where the sun is hiding, Luminary’s got you covered. Luminary works entirely offline, so you can access sun data anytime, anywhere. It’s dirt simple to get started—just launch the app and voilà!

Reply via email

item.title: Year in Pixels
item.description:
Keep track of whatever you want in a year using pixels! Data is stored on your device, and can be imported and exported.

Links: GitHub, Website

Reply via email
